channel.title: CVE Feed for ESTsoft -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ESTsoft -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-29886|2024-08-03T06:33:42.933Z -- estsoft -- alyac
item.description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the way ESTsoft Alyac 2.5.8.544 parses OLE files. A specially-crafted OLE file can lead to a heap buffer overflow, which can result in arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-32543|2024-08-03T07:46:44.611Z -- estsoft -- alyac
item.description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the way ESTsoft Alyac 2.5.8.544 parses OLE files. A specially-crafted OLE file can lead to a heap buffer overflow which can result in arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-21147|2024-08-03T02:31:59.003Z -- estsoft -- alyac
item.description: An out of bounds read vulnerability exists in the malware scan functionality of ESTsoft Alyac 2.5.7.7. A specially-crafted PE file can trigger this vulnerability to cause denial of service and termination of malware scan. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
